ygData.subject: Re: BlackStorm or Nightlight?

The Caveman, panicing beyond his wildest dreams, tried to get as small as he 
could to hide from the strange creatures. ALl he could do now was wait.

--part1_145.197f3f2a.2ca23b0e_boundary
